book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲁⲇⲁⲙ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: And all men are from the ground, and Adam was created of earth:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲟⲣϫⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲥⲃⲱ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ.
English: In much knowledge the Lord hath divided them, and made their ways diverse.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲟⲓ̈ⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲁⲥⲧⲟⲩ ⲁϥⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁϥϩⲟⲛⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ.
English: Some of them hath he blessed and exalted and some of them he sanctified, and set near himself:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥϩⲟⲩⲣ ϩⲟⲓ̈ⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲑⲃ̅ⲃⲓⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁⲩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲓ ⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲛⲁϩⲉⲣⲁⲧⲟⲩ.
English: but some of them hath he cursed and brought low, and turned out of their places.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲩⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲩⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ.
English: As the clay is in the potter’s hand, to fashion it at his pleasure:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ.
English: so man is in the hand of him that made him, to render to them as liketh him best.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲙⲟⲩ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲉϥⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ.
English: Good is set against evil, and life against death: so is the godly against the sinner, and the sinner against the godly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲓ̈ϩⲉ ⲉⲛⲉϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲟⲩⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁ.
English: So look upon all the works of the most High; and there are two and two, one against another.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲛⲟⲕ ϩⲱ ⲁⲓ̈ⲣ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲡϩⲁⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲓ̈ⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅.
English: Though I was the last to wake up, yet I received their inheritance as from the beginning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲧⲁϩⲙⲉϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲕⲧⲛ̅ⲧⲱⲛϥ̅ ⲉⲡⲉⲕϣⲣ̅ⲡ ⲙ̅ⲙⲓⲥⲉ.
English: O Lord, have mercy upon the people that is called by thy name, and upon Israel, whom thou hast named thy firstborn.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲛ̅ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ϩⲁ ⲧⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲁ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲑⲓⲉⲣⲟⲩⲥⲁⲗⲏⲙ ⲡⲉⲕⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲱⲡⲉ.
English: O be merciful unto Jerusalem, thy holy city, the place of thy rest.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲓⲱⲛ ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲉⲧⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲉⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Fill Sion with thine unspeakable oracles, and thy people with thy glory:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲥⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲟⲩⲛⲉⲥ ⲛⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲓⲁ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧϩⲓ ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ.
English: Give testimony unto those that thou hast possessed from the beginning, and raise up prophets that have been in thy name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲟⲩⲃⲉⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲩⲡⲟⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲡϫⲟⲓ̈ⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲁⲣⲟⲩⲧⲁⲛϩⲉⲧ ⲛⲉⲕⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ.
English: Reward them that wait for thee, and let thy prophets be found faithful.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲉⲕⲗⲁⲟⲥ.
English: O Lord, hear the prayer of thy servants, according to the blessing of Aaron over thy people,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ .... ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲕ ⲡⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: that all they which dwell upon the earth may know that thou art the Lord, the eternal God.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ... ⲉⲥⲟⲩⲉⲙ ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲛⲓⲙ: .... ⲟⲩⲱⲙ ⲇⲉ ⲉϥⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲉϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲙ.
English: The belly devoureth all meats, yet is one meat better than another.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉϣⲟⲩⲱⲃⲉ ⲧⲉ ϣⲁⲥⲧⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛⲁϥ: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲡ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲗ.
English: As the palate tasteth divers kinds of venison: so doth an heart of understanding false speeches.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲉϥϭⲟⲟⲙⲉ ϯ ⲟⲩⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲧⲟⲟⲃⲉⲥ ⲛⲁϥ.
English: A froward heart causeth heaviness: but a man of experience will recompense him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ϫⲓ ϩⲟⲟⲩⲧ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲉⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲉⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ.
English: A woman will receive every man, yet is one daughter better than another.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ϯ ⲟⲩⲣⲟⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥϩⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲥⲥⲟⲧⲡ̅ ⲉⲉⲡⲓⲑⲩⲙⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: The beauty of a woman cheereth the countenance, and a man loveth nothing better.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲛⲁϩⲓ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲣⲁϣ ϩⲓ ⲛⲉⲥⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲉⲓⲉ ⲡⲉⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ.
English: If there be kindness, meekness, and comfort, in her tongue, then is not her husband like other men.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲕⲱ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲁϥⲁⲣⲭⲓ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱ ⲛⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲃⲟⲏⲑⲟⲥ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲥⲧⲩⲗⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲧⲟⲛ.
English: He that getteth a wife beginneth a possession, a help like unto himself, and a pillar of rest.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡϭⲱⲙ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ϫⲟⲗϫⲗ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϣⲁⲩⲧⲟⲣⲡϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲛⲁⲁϣⲁϩⲟⲙ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅
English: Where no hedge is, there the possession is spoiled: and he that hath no wife will wander up and down mourning.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲧⲁⲛϩⲟⲩⲧ ..... ⲉϥϩⲏⲕ ⲉϥϥⲱϭⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲉⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ;
English: Who will trust a thief well appointed, that skippeth from city to city?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅ .... ⲡⲉ ⲉϣⲁϥϭⲟⲉⲓⲗⲉ ⲉⲡⲙⲁ ⲉⲧϥ̅ⲛⲁϫⲓⲣⲟⲩϩⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: so who will believe a man that hath no house, and lodgeth wheresoever the night taketh him?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛⲁϫⲟⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲁⲓ̈ⲣ̅ϣⲃⲏⲣ ϩⲱ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ ϣⲃⲏⲣ.
English: Every friend saith, I am his friend also: but there is a friend, which is only a friend in name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ⲗⲩⲡⲏ ϣⲟⲟⲡ ϣⲁϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉⲩⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲕ ⲉϣⲁⲩⲕⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲉⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁϫⲉ;
English: Is it not a grief unto death, when a companion and friend is turned to an enemy?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲱ ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲕⲉⲓ ⲧⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲃ̅ⲥ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲣⲟϥ;
English: O wicked imagination, whence camest thou in to cover the earth with deceit?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ϩⲏⲇⲁⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲃⲏⲣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲑⲗⲓⲯⲓⲥ ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲟⲩⲃⲏϥ.
English: There is a companion, which rejoiceth in the prosperity of a friend, but in the time of trouble will be against him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩϣⲃⲏⲣ ϣⲡ̅ϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲃⲏⲣ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ϥⲛⲁϫⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϭⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲟⲥ.
English: There is a companion, which helpeth his friend for the belly, and taketh up the buckler against the enemy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϣⲃⲏⲣ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲣⲏⲙⲁ.
English: Forget not thy friend in thy mind, and be not unmindful of him in thy riches.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲣⲉϥϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲛⲁⲧⲟⲩⲛⲉⲥ ⲟⲩϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲣⲉϥϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲟⲩⲁⲁϥ.
English: Every counsellor extolleth counsel; but there is some that counselleth for himself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲣⲉϥϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲣⲡ̅ ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲁϩⲉ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩ;
English: Beware of a counsellor, and know before what need he hath;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ϥⲛⲁϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲟⲩⲁⲁϥ ⲙⲏⲡⲟⲧⲉ ⲛϥ̅ⲛⲉϫ ⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲱⲕ
English: for he will counsel for himself; lest he cast the lot upon thee,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛϥ̅ϫⲟⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲕ ϫⲉ ⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩ ⲧⲉⲕϩⲓⲏ ⲛϥ̅ⲁϩⲉ ⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ.
English: And say unto thee, Thy way is good: and afterward he stand on the other side, to see what shall befall thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓ̈ⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲱⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲛ ⲉⲧⲕⲱϩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ.
English: Consult not with one that suspecteth thee: and hide thy counsel from such as envy thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϫⲓϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲥϩⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲥⲕⲟⲓ̈ϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲱⲃ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲡⲟⲗⲉⲙⲟⲥ
English: Neither consult with a woman touching her of whom she is jealous; neither with a coward in matters of war;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉϣⲱⲧ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲉⲧⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϣⲱⲡ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϯ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲉⲣⲃⲟⲟⲛⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲉϥϯ
English: nor with a merchant concerning exchange; nor with a buyer of selling; nor with an envious man of thankfulness;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲁⲧⲛⲁ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲁⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲉϥϫⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ
English: nor with an unmerciful man touching kindness; nor with the slothful for any work;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϫⲁⲓ̈ⲃⲉⲕⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲏⲏⲛⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲛ̅ⲁⲣⲅⲟⲥ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ.
English: nor with an hireling for a year of finishing work; nor with an idle servant of much business:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲕⲁ ϩⲧⲏⲕ ⲉⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ϣⲟϫⲛⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ
English: hearken not unto these in any matter of counsel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲗⲗⲁ ⲉⲕⲛⲁⲧⲁϣⲟⲕ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲕ̅ⲛⲁⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϫⲉ ϥⲛⲁⲁⲣⲉϩ ⲉⲧⲉⲛⲧⲟⲗⲏ.
English: But be continually with a godly man, whom thou knowest to keep the commandments of the Lord,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕϣⲁⲛϫⲱⲣⲡ̅ ϥⲛⲁϣⲡ̅ϩⲓⲥⲉ ...
English: whose, mind is according to thy mind, and will sorrow with thee, if thou shalt miscarry. (13) And let the counsel of thine own heart stand:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛⲁⲕ.
English: for there is no man more faithful unto thee than it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲧⲟⲛⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ⲉϩⲟⲩ ⲉⲥⲁϣϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲩϩⲙ̅ⲟⲟⲥ ⲉⲩϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲙⲁ ⲉϥϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: For a man’s mind is sometime wont to tell him more than seven watchmen, that sit above in an high tower.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϫⲉ ϥⲥⲟⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϩⲓⲏ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲉ.
English: And above all this pray to the most High, that he will direct thy way in truth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲣⲭⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲑⲁⲏ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉ ⲡϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: Let reason go before every enterprise, and counsel before every action.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲡⲉ ⲫⲏⲧ.
English: The countenance is a sign of changing of the heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲧⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛⲉⲧⲟⲩⲟⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ: ⲡⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲛ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲡⲉⲑⲟⲟⲩ ⲡⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ: ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲡ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲗⲁⲥ.
English: Four manner of things appear: good and evil, life and death: but the tongue ruleth over them continually.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲉⲩⲁⲧϣⲁⲩ ⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲙ̅ⲙⲓⲛ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ.
English: There is one that is wise and teacheth many, and yet is unprofitable to himself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϯ ⲥⲁⲕ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲩⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ⲡⲉ: ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲛⲁⲣ̅ϭⲣⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲣⲩⲫⲏ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: There is one that sheweth wisdom in words, and is hated: he shall be destitute of all food.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϯ ⲛⲉϥⲭⲁⲣⲓⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁϩⲣⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϫⲉ ⲁⲩϩⲟⲩⲣⲱⲱϥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: For grace is not given, him from the Lord, because he is deprived of all wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲯⲩⲭⲏ .ⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ.
English: Another is wise to himself; and the fruits of understanding are commendable in his mouth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ.
English: A wise man instructeth his people; and the fruits of his understanding fail not.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟϥ.
English: A wise man shall be filled with blessing; and all they that see him shall count him happy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲏⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲁⲧⲏⲡⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ.
English: The days of the life of man may be numbered: but the days of Israel are innumerable.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲛⲁⲕⲗⲏⲣⲟⲛⲟⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲡⲓⲥⲧⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲛⲁⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: A wise man shall inherit glory among his people, and his name shall be perpetual.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲓⲣⲁⲍⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲯⲩⲭⲏ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲛⲁⲩ ϫⲉ ⲟⲩ ⲡⲉⲧϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛⲁⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲙ̅ⲧⲁⲁϥ ⲛⲁⲥ.
English: My son, prove thy soul in thy life, and see what is evil for it, and give not that unto it.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲣ̅ⲛⲟϥⲣⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲧⲏⲧ ⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ.
English: For all things are not profitable for all men, neither hath every soul pleasure in every thing.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲁⲧⲥⲉⲓ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲩⲫⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲡⲟⲣϣⲕ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲟⲟⲙ.
English: Be not unsatiable in any dainty thing, nor too greedy upon meats:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲛ̅ϩⲁϩ ⲛ̅ϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲙ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ϣⲱⲛⲉ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲧⲥⲉⲓ ϩⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲩⲭⲟⲗⲏ.
English: For excess of meats bringeth sickness, and surfeiting will turn into choler.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ϩⲁϩ ⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ... ⲡⲉⲧ ....
English: By surfeiting have many perished; but he that taketh heed prolongeth his life.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲁⲧⲁⲉⲓⲉ ⲡⲥⲁⲉⲓⲛ ....: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲥⲟⲛⲧϥ̅.
English: Honour a physician with the honour due unto him for the uses which ye may have of him: for the Lord hath created him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲅⲁⲣ ϩⲓⲧⲙ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁϥϫⲓ ⲧⲁⲉⲓⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲣⲟ.
English: For of the most High cometh healing, and he shall receive honour of the king.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲡⲓⲥⲧⲏⲙⲏ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲉⲓⲛ ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲁⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲩⲣ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ.
English: The skill of the physician shall lift up his head: and in the sight of great men he shall be in admiration.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϩⲣⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲙⲁϥⲙⲉⲥⲧⲱⲟⲩ.
English: The Lord hath created medicines out of the earth; and he that is wise will not abhor them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙⲏ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲛ ϩⲗⲟϭ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲉ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩⲉⲓⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲉϥϭⲟⲙ;
English: Was not the water made sweet with wood, that the virtue thereof might be known?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥϯⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉⲧⲣⲉⲩϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ.
English: And he hath given men skill, that he might be honoured in his marvellous works.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲣ̅ⲡⲁϩⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲧⲕⲁⲥ.
English: With such doth he heal men, and taketh away their pains.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲥⲥⲟϭⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲧⲁⲙⲓⲉ ⲟⲩⲙⲓⲅⲙⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲱϫⲛ̅; ϯⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲧϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲫⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: Of such doth the apothecary make a confection; and of his works there is no end; and from him is peace over all the earth,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲃϣⲕ̅ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕϣⲱⲛⲉ ⲁⲗⲗⲁ .... ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲉ.... ⲛⲁⲕ.
English: My son, in thy sickness be not negligent: but pray unto the Lord, and he will make thee whole.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕϭⲓϫ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ.
English: Leave off from sin, and order thine hands aright, and cleanse thy heart from all wickedness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϯⲛⲟⲩϥⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁⲙⲓⲧ: ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲧⲉⲕⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉϣⲟⲟⲡ ⲁⲛ.
English: Give a sweet savour, and a memorial of fine flour; and make a fat offering, as not being.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲅ̅ϯ ⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲁⲉⲓⲛ ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲥⲟⲛⲧϥ̅: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲧⲣⲉϥⲟⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲕⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲭⲣⲉⲓⲁ ⲛⲁϥ.
English: Then give place to the physician, for the Lord hath created him: let him not go from thee, for thou hast need of him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲟⲩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ.
English: There is a time when in their hands there is good success.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲥⲉⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϫⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙⲧⲟⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲉⲩϭⲓⲛⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: For they shall also pray unto the Lord, that he would prosper that, which they give for ease and remedy to prolong life.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲓⲟϥ ⲉⲓ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲥⲁⲉⲓⲛ.
English: He that sinneth before his Maker, let him fall into the hand of the physician.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲣⲓⲙⲉ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲕⲱⲱⲥ ⲛⲅ̅ⲁⲣⲭⲓ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲉⲓⲧ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲙⲟⲕϩ̅ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ.
English: My son, let tears fall down over the dead, and begin to lament, as if thou hadst suffered great harm thyself;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲗ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲟⲃϣⲕ̅ ⲉⲧⲉϥⲕⲁⲉⲓⲥⲉ.
English: and then cover his body according to the custom, and neglect not his burial.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓ ⲟⲩⲣⲓⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲛⲁϣⲧ̅ ⲛⲅ̅ⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲟⲩⲛⲉϩⲡⲉ ⲛⲅ̅ⲣ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲃⲉ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲙ̅ⲡϣⲁ
English: Weep bitterly, and make great moan, and use lamentation, as he is worthy,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ ϣⲁ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲗ̅ⲥⲱⲗ ...:
English: and that a day or two, lest thou be evil spoken of: and then comfort thyself for thy heaviness.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲅⲁⲣ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲧⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲕⲱⲗϫ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧϭⲟⲙ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲧ.
English: For of heaviness cometh death, and the heaviness of the heart breaketh strength.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϣⲁⲣⲉ ⲧⲗⲩⲡⲏ ⲟⲩⲱϩ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛϩⲓⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧϭⲓⲛⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲙ̅ⲫⲏⲕⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: In affliction also sorrow remaineth: and the life of the poor is the curse of the heart.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ϯ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩⲗⲩⲡⲏ: ⲥⲁϩⲱⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲁⲕⲣ̅ ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕϩⲁⲏ.
English: Take no heaviness to heart: drive it away, and member the last end.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲣ̅ⲣ̅ⲡⲱⲃϣ̅: ⲙⲛ̅ ⲑⲉ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲧⲣⲉϥⲕⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁϯϩⲏⲩ ⲁⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲕⲛⲁⲑⲙ̅ⲕⲟⲕ.
English: Forget it not, for there is no turning again: thou shalt not do him good, but hurt thyself.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲣⲓⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϩⲁⲡ ϫⲉ ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲱⲕ: ⲁⲥϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟⲩ.
English: Remember my judgment: for thine also shall be so; yesterday for me, and to day for thee.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲛⲕⲟⲧⲕ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱⲱⲥ ⲙⲁⲧⲁⲗϭⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲅ̅ⲥⲗ̅ⲥⲱⲗⲕ̅ ⲉϫⲱϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲓⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲡⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ.
English: When the dead is at rest, let his remembrance rest; and be comforted for him, when his Spirit is departed from him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲅⲣⲁⲙⲙⲁⲧⲉⲩⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ⲥⲣ̅ϥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲥⲟⲃⲕ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ.
English: The wisdom of a learned man cometh by opportunity of leisure: and he that hath little business shall become wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲥⲟⲫⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲡⲉⲧⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲃ̅ⲃⲉ ⲉϥϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϫⲟⲕⲉϥ .......ⲏⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ .... ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ϩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲥⲉ;
English: How can he get wisdom that holdeth the plough, and that glorieth in the goad, that driveth oxen, and is occupied in their labours, and whose talk is of bullocks?

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲧⲗⲟⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ϯ ϩⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁϩⲥⲉ.
English: He giveth his mind to make furrows; and is diligent to give the kine fodder.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲙϣⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ϩⲓ ⲁⲣⲭⲓⲧⲉⲕⲧⲱⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϯⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: So every carpenter and workmaster, that laboureth night and day:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲉⲧϣⲟϫⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲕⲗⲩⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥϩⲩⲡⲟⲙⲟⲛⲏ ⲡⲉϣⲓⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲩⲁⲛ.
English: and they that cut and grave seals, and are diligent to make great variety,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲩⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲍⲱⲅⲣⲁⲫⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉϫⲉⲕ ⲡⲉϥϩⲱⲃ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ.
English: and give themselves to counterfeit imagery, and watch to finish a work:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲙⲕⲗ̅ⲗⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲉϥϩⲙⲟⲟⲥ ϩⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲙⲏϣ ⲉϥϯ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏϥ ⲉⲫⲱⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲡⲉⲛⲓⲡⲉ.
English: The smith also sitting by the anvil, and considering the iron work,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲗ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲛⲁⲃⲗ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲕⲁⲁⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϥⲛⲁϯ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲑⲙ̅ⲙⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϣ.
English: the vapour of the fire wasteth his flesh, and he fighteth with the heat of the furnace:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉϩⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲫⲁⲧⲏⲣ ⲛⲁⲧⲙ̅ⲧⲙ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲙⲁⲁϫⲉ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛⲉϥⲃⲁⲗ ϯ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲏⲩ ⲉⲡⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲛⲁⲁⲩ.
English: the noise of the hammer and the anvil is ever in his ears, and his eyes look still upon the pattern of the thing that he maketh;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲉϫⲉⲕ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲉϥⲟⲩϣⲏ ⲛ̅ⲣⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲁⲛⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲩⲉⲙⲏ.
English: he setteth his mind to finish his work, and watcheth to polish it perfectly:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲉ ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲩⲥ ⲉϥϩⲙ̅ⲟⲟⲥ ⲉⲡⲉϥϩⲱⲃ ⲉϥⲕⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲧⲣⲟⲭⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲟⲩⲉⲣⲏⲧⲉ.
English: So doth the potter sitting at his work, and turning the wheel about with his feet,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧϥⲓⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϩⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉϥⲉⲓⲟⲡⲏ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲡ.
English: who is alway carefully set at his work, and maketh all his work by number;
